metadata.name: Shattered Symbols
metadata.description:
[h1][b] Shattered Symbols [/b][/h1]
Break through Shattered Symbols, a mod that adds [b]over 35 unique items that expanding and enhancing synergies, mechanics, and strategic depth.[/b]
[h2][b] About the Mod [/b][/h2] Shattered Symbols brings a fresh layer of complexity and strategy to your run. Explore new relics that makes you discover gameplay dynamics and multiplayer interactions. [b]Master the power behind Broken Hearts and Runes to reshape your experience.[/b]
[h2]Key Features[/h2]
[b] • Over 35 new items[/b] [b] • 3 New Transformations[/b] [b] • 6 New Consumables[/b] [b] • Expand the enchanting synergies of the game and discover new dynamics with really unique items effects[/b] [b] • Designed with Multiplayer compatiblity to share the experience and items effects with friends.[/b]
[h3][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3127536138&searchtext=repentogon] Repentogon[/url] is not required for the mod to work, but installing it allows you to view some graphical content[/h3]
[h3]Credits[/h3] [b]LucaDLC[/b]: Creator / Programmer [b]Ashura天罰[/b]: Programmer / Texture Artist
[url=https://github.com/LucaDLC/Shattered_Symbols] GitHub [/url]
